text:
[Verse]
Sun's gone dark the clouds are gray
Raindrops fall we're here to play
Splash the puddles night and day
Dancin' in the rain

[Verse 2]
Feet are movin' fast and free
Laughin' loud just you and me
Spinnin' round so wild and free
Feel the cooling breeze

[Chorus]
Dance in the rain with me
Let your worries flee
Under the storm we'll be
So wild and free

[Verse 3]
Lightning strikes but we don't care
Hold my hand let's take the dare
Feel alive like we're in air
Dancin' everywhere

[Bridge]
Let's forget the world's in strife
In this moment feel the life
With the rain we'll end all strife
In this dance we thrive

[Chorus]
Dance in the rain with me
Let your worries flee
Under the storm we'll be
So wild and free
title: Dance in the Rain
